import React from 'react' import './projectpage.css' import gitHub from '../assets/images/icon/programs icon/github-icon.png' import smallRightArrow from '../assets/images/icon/small-right-arrow.png' import smallLeftArrow from '../assets/images/icon/small-left-arrow.png' function ProjectPage({projectData}) { const [isListVisible, setListVisible] = useState(false); const toggleList = () => { setListVisible(!isListVisible); }; return (

{projectData[0].title}

{projectData[0].description} {isListVisible && (
  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3
  • Item 4
)}
) } export default ProjectPage
